extendedInfo.description: China Hotel 80% Discount is one of the largest hotel comparison site with more than 2300++ hotels booking in China.Key FeaturesReserve your hotel in China with ease and at the best rate from your phone. â Search for nearby hotels or hostels or budget hotel in China.â Find and book a room securely with over 1100++ in China.â Find and book a room securely in All Countries.â Hotel Reservations made easy with this China Hotel app. Simple and secure booking process.â Hotel information, guest reviews, photos, descriptions, maps of hotel.â Up to 80% discounts on hotels, hostels and motels. Instant online and phone bookings available with immediate room confirmation.âChoose your favorite brands including; Hilton, Marriott, Best Western, Sheraton, Holiday Inn and many more.âThere are no fees, no mark-ups and it is FREE to use.Use our hotel guest reviews and opinions from genuine customers to find the perfect hotel for you â we even âinclude TripAdvisor reviews!Book your room now!Features include:â¢ Simple search by location, dates and guestsâ¢ âAround Meâ search to find what is available around you at that exact momentâ¢ Search results can be viewed two ways - on a map or in a list formatâ¢ Interactive map with zoom in, zoom out, and swipe to reveal more hotels â¢ View all hotel details, guest ratings, images and features the hotel offersâ¢ Comparison table for all hotels and the best rates available for all our partner booking sitesâ¢ Refine your search by price, star ratings, areas, hotel features and moreâ¢ Book with our partner websites by simply clicking âbookâ on your hotel of choiceâ¢ Big image gallery â¢ Apps in 39 languagesâ¢ The only app that allow you to search all the hotel deals in Malaysia and All other Countries.â¢ One search and our app will search all the listed hotels and give you the best prices in one screen for all the deals.
